summary: Bonbon V2 save game.  Level 1 Nord and Redguard
descriptionHtml:
[b]Please endorse if you use this.[/b]

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img441/6573/bonbonmain.jpg[/IMG]


Two Bonbons for your enjoyment!
Two Bonbons? That right, two.
Chocolaty goodness on the outside... creamy goodness on the inside.

Please do not re-post this mod anywhere else, this is a Nexus exclusive.


If you would like to duplicate Bonbon\'s look here is the mods I used:
[i][b]Hair:[/b][/i] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full[/url]

[i][b]Eyes:[/b][/i] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty PLAYER Unleashed-13722-8-1[/url]

[i][b]Face*[/b]:[/i]
1 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30]No_More_Blocky_Faces-1_50-30-1-5[/url]
2 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella Version 3-2812-3[/url] (too shiny for me)
3 Better Females by Bella No shine-2812-1
4 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26113]Better Females NEW NORMALMAPS by zzjay 26113-1-0[/url]
5 Better Females by zzjay Version 1-26113-1-1

[i][b]Body*:[/b][/i]
1 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP_BASE_Main_body_V1dot2[/url]
2 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16731]UNP Fitness Body abs[/url]

[i][b]Clothing:[/b][/i]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20415]UNP Mashup Compilation v1-20415-1[/url]

[i][b]Picture locations:[/b][/i]
Nord: Breezehome
Redguard: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14152]Levelers Tower ESP V31-14152-3-1[/url]

[i][b]*Install in this order.[/b][/i]


[i][b]Credits/Thanks To:[/b][/i]
nexus
Bethesda Softworks, LLC
All the great modders here
author: Waning Gibbous
